title: Jenkins security advisory (AV25-149)
description: On March 19, 2025, Jenkins published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products::
products: EDDSA API Plugin  version 3.0-13.v7cb_69ed68f00 and prior
Zoho QEngine Plugin  version 0.29.vfa_cc23396502 and prior
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
